Civil

Register Now

1. Tower Making

Objective : To build a tower with maximum (high elasticity) deflection using minimum number of ice cream sticks and materials provided

No. of Participants : 4-5 members in a group

Registration fees: ₹30 per member

Rules and Regulations :

  1. All the necessary items required will be provided.
  2. Maximum time allotted is 4 hours.
  3. Results will be declared after 1 month (tentative).
  4. Decision of the judges will be final.
Prizes Worth: 7K

2. Dream Planner (3D)

Objective : To plan and design a bird's eye view of a given type of building using the materials provided

No. of Participants : 3-4 members in a group

Registration fees: ₹20 per member

  • All necessary items will be provided.
  • Pen, pencil and other stationary items are to be brought by the participants.
  • Maximum time allotted is 2 hours.
  • The models will be evaluated on the basis of design, aesthetics and convenience.
  • Results will be declared during the closing ceremony.
  • Decision of the judges will be final.
    • Prizes Worth: 5K
